page.title: 03Houses in Our Area
page.content: The houses in the old village of Kirkfieldbank are mostly grey sandstone,cottage_type and larger six and seven roomed houses built around one hundred years ago.There are some modern council houses,both terraced and in flats.These are called locally the "Electric Flats" because they are fueled entirely by electricity.Other houses may use coal or calor gas .There is no coal gas or natural gas in the village. There is some pleasant private housing in the west end of Lanark included in the survey.There is also a fairly large area of housing just three_quarters of a mile to the west of the village, owned by the Council and known as "The scheme"
